data.title: The Best Country Songs About Chairs & Other Furniture Playlist
data.meta_description: A playlist of The Best Country Songs About Furniture on Holler featuring George Strait, Lauren Watkins and many more
data.text:
Country singers and songwriters find their inspiration in the funniest places sometimes, but often it's what's right there in front of them that prompts them to pick up their pen and write a country classic.

Morgan Wallen might prefer to throw his out of the window, but the humble chair has also inspired songs by George Strait, Kenny Chesney and Marty Robbins among others. While beds have often been the setting for tales of heartbreak, drunkenness and infidelity. Whether it's John Denver in his grandma's feather one or Shania Twain wondering whose her boyfriend's boots have been under.

When it comes to tables, Courtney Marie Andrews is sitting at one for one, Loretta Lynn has one for two and The Highwomen have invited everyone over to sit around theirs.

Just like IKEA, we've got a full and varied range for you in our playlist of The Best Country Songs About Furniture.

See the full tracklist below:
